name: SUPER SAILFISH
notes: The successor to the original SAILFISH (first introduced in 1948). These early models were built of plywood and many were sold as kits. A fiberglass SUPER SAILFISH was introduced in 1959 and the SAILFISH was discontinued shortly afterward. Until it was discontinued, ALCORT produced several hundred SUPER SAILFISH a year. It was soon eclipsed in popularity by the hugely successful SUNFISH, which was first produced in fiberglass at about the same time.
